channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump threatens Apple with 25% tariff: Is now a good time to buy an iPhone?
item.description: On Friday, President Donald Trump threatened Apple with 25% tariffs on any iPhone sold, but not made, in the U.S.

item.title: Ships are canceling crossings to U.S., and Trump’s new 50% E.U. tariff threat isn’t likely to help

item.title: Dollar decline, tariff tantrums and hair-trigger volatility could snap the stock market
item.description: Trump’s tariffs stunned Main Street. Now they may starve Wall Street.

item.title: My daughter’s boyfriend, a guest in my home, offered to powerwash part of my house — then demanded money
item.description: “The amount was about what I would have paid to get the whole house done, and not just one side.’

item.title: The ‘mother of all credit squeezes’ is coming — hang on to your wallet
item.description: Consumer confidence is buckling, and debt is mounting. Here’s how to steer your portfolio.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
